Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. Going forward, we remain committed to aggressive investment in both our people and our products as we pursue an innovation agenda. Announcing financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2010. Google reported revenues of$ 7.29 billion for the quarter ended September 30, 2010, an increase of 23% compared to the third quarter of 2009
